DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: I'm with Valentine's Detective Agency. You asked for help?
RESPONSE TEXT: A good samaritan? Fine. I'm out of options anyway. If you want to hear about it.
My daughter is missing. It all started with this damn radio.
DIALOGUE AFTER: ReiNakano: Our daughter Kasumi likes to fix things. The radio was her latest project.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Nick: Uh... right. Yeah, it's starting to come back to me... Sorry things ended sour.
RESPONSE TEXT: We got out, that's all that mattered. And now you can return the favor by finding my daughter...
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: We're here to help. Tell us what happened.

RESPONSE TEXT: She went that far up North? God, that explains why she took the boat...

RESPONSE TEXT: There's no time to waste, you have to go after her!
DIALOGUE AFTER: ReiNakano: Wait! Did you find out why she left, detective? Who she was speaking to?

RESPONSE TEXT: She went that far up North? God, that explains why she took the boat...
You have to go after her! Please. Take my other ship on the dock outside. My father's design.
It has a guidance system, and it's built for distance.
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: I'll get to the bottom of this, Kenji.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: ReiNakano: Wait! Did you find out why she left, detective? Who she was speaking to?
RESPONSE TEXT: What does it matter?
DIALOGUE AFTER: ReiNakano: Because I know my daughter, and if she didn't tell us where she went, then she had a reason. Don't you want to know if she wants to be found?

DIALOGUE BEFORE: ReiNakano: Because I know my daughter, and if she didn't tell us where she went, then she had a reason. Don't you want to know if she wants to be found?
RESPONSE TEXT: *sigh* You're right. Detective, did you find any clue to why Kasumi left home?
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: I think I know where Kasumi went. A place called Far Harbor.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: Oh god... Does she even think we're still her parents?
RESPONSE TEXT: This is what I was afraid of. Someone twisting my daughter's mind.
DIALOGUE AFTER: KenjiNakano: You have to get to Far Harbor. Take my ship on the dock. It has a guidance system. A final gift from my father. And it's built for distance.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: KenjiNakano: This is what I was afraid of. Someone twisting my daughter's mind.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: KenjiNakano: This is what I was afraid of. Someone twisting my daughter's mind.
RESPONSE TEXT: Did you find where Kasumi went, detective?
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: I think I know where Kasumi went. A place called Far Harbor.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: Anything more you can tell me about Kasumi? The smallest detail could be important.
RESPONSE TEXT: I don't know what more to say. She's my little girl and she doesn't know how dangerous this world is.
I never should have let her grandfather teach her how to how to fix these machines.
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: Anything more you can tell me about Kasumi? The smallest detail could be important.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: Anything more you can tell me about Kasumi? The smallest detail could be important.
RESPONSE TEXT: Ever since she was old enough to walk, yes. Her grandfather had an ear for machines. Kasumi picked up the knack.
SCRIPT NOTES: player asked about Kasumi's grandfather teaching her about mechanics / Worried

RESPONSE TEXT: He... passed away recently. He used to scavenge the ruins in the south for parts. I kept telling him he was getting too old...
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: Anything more you can tell me about Kasumi? The smallest detail could be important.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: No more questions right now.
RESPONSE TEXT: Work quickly, detective.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: Tell me more about this radio she was fixing.
RESPONSE TEXT: I've tried to get that damn thing to work over and over again, but there's nothing.
I thought she just wanted to strip it for parts or build a toaster out of it, or something, like she usually does.
Someone made contact with her, and then they took her. God, what kind of twisted psychopath has my daughter?
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: Anything more you can tell me about Kasumi? The smallest detail could be important.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: Why did your daughter really leave? Your wife says she left on her own, but you said it was kidnappers.
RESPONSE TEXT: I know it was kidnappers. Kasumi is a smart girl, but she doesn't know how... horrible people can be. Not like me and Rei.
Why would she just leave her family? With no explanation? Someone tricked her. Got her to leave the safety of home.
Every minute we aren't looking for my daughter, her life is in jeopardy.
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: Anything more you can tell me about Kasumi? The smallest detail could be important.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: I'm with Valentine's Detective Agency. You asked for help?
RESPONSE TEXT: Oh thank god. You have to get working right away.
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: We're here to help. Tell us what happened.
SCRIPT NOTES: player says he's with Nick Valentine / Relieved

RESPONSE TEXT: What? Who are you? I'm sorry, but we don't have time for visitors or caravans or wherever you're from.
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: I'm with Valentine's Detective Agency. You asked for help?
SCRIPT NOTES: stranger has entered your house / Suspicious

DIALOGUE BEFORE: KenjiNakano: No, she would've told us where she was going. She would've said... something!
RESPONSE TEXT: I know my daughter is in danger. I can feel it. Find her. Please.
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: I already took a look around. I think I know what happened to Kasumi.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: ReiNakano: Our daughter Kasumi likes to fix things. The radio was her latest project.
RESPONSE TEXT: Until she made contact with some kidnapper who lured her away from us.
DIALOGUE AFTER: ReiNakano: Or maybe she left on her own. She's not a child anymore.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: ReiNakano: Our daughter is nineteen. She knows how to survive, and she's capable. I... think maybe she left because she wanted her own life.
RESPONSE TEXT: No, she would've told us where she was going. She would've said... something!
DIALOGUE AFTER: KenjiNakano: I know my daughter is in danger. I can feel it. Find her. Please.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: What can I expect out there, Kenji?
RESPONSE TEXT: I only made the trip to Far Harbor once, when I was a boy. All I remember is that my father didn't want to stay long. Something about the air being bad.
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: I'll get to the bottom of this, Kenji.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: A magic boat ride! Will there be sea monsters?
RESPONSE TEXT: Umm... While I know the seas aren't exactly safe, I'm confident that boat can get you there unharmed. At least, I hope.
I know you haven't asked for payment, and we can't offer much, but here. Please take it, I insist. For expenses, if nothing else.
DIALOGUE AFTER: Nick: I know my partner here can be a little glib, but we won't rest until we get to the bottom of this. You two have my word.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: A magic boat ride! Will there be sea monsters?
RESPONSE TEXT: Umm... While I know the seas aren't exactly safe, I'm confident that boat can get you there unharmed. At least, I hope.
Before you go, here's the payment we discussed. I'll have something more when Kasumi is safely back home.
DIALOGUE AFTER: Nick: I know my partner here can be a little glib, but we won't rest until we get to the bottom of this. You two have my word.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: That's crazy. I'm not taking a ride on some rusty boat.
RESPONSE TEXT: I trust that boat with my life. My father worked on it every day until he died. And it's all I can offer.
Let me know if you change your mind.
DIALOGUE AFTER: Nick: My partner here is just a little nervous. Never been on a boat before. We'll be back.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: I'll get to the bottom of this, Kenji.
RESPONSE TEXT: Thank you. I know you haven't asked for payment, and we can't offer much, but here. Please take it, I insist. For expenses, if nothing else.
DIALOGUE AFTER: Nick: I know it'll be hard waiting for word, but try to carry on like normal. We'll be back as soon as we can.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: I'll get to the bottom of this, Kenji.

DIALOGUE AFTER: Nick: I know it'll be hard waiting for word, but try to carry on like normal. We'll be back as soon as we can.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: Still looking.

RESPONSE TEXT: What? That's ... that's crazy...!
DIALOGUE AFTER: ReiNakano: She's not a synth! She's our daughter. We raised her. I... I gave birth to her. She's flesh and blood, not a synthetic.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: I need to ask you an important question. Are you sure your daughter is human?
RESPONSE TEXT: What kind of question is that? Why are you asking?

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: I need to ask you an important question. Are you sure your daughter is human?

DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: I think I know where Kasumi went. A place called Far Harbor.
